code-runner.executorMap.python: conda activate pu; pyinstaller -F app.spec && dist/app $dir$fileNameWithoutExt

python.formatting.yapfArgs: --style={BASED_ON_STYLE: google, BLANK_LINES_AROUND_TOP_LEVEL_DEFINITION: 1, BLANK_LINE_BEFORE_NESTED_CLASS_OR_DEF: 0, COLUMN_LIMIT: 96, CONTINUATION_INDENT_WIDTH: 4, INDENT_BLANK_LINES: true, INDENT_WIDTH: 4, JOIN_MULTIPLE_LINES: true, SPACES_BEFORE_COMMENT: 1, SPLIT_COMPLEX_COMPREHENSION: true}
